title: Hash One Gaming - Recruiting Dia+ - Competitive Ranked 5's [Challenger5v5]

embed.description: Please fill the form out FULLY. Any incomplete responses will be junked.

body:
We've got all the apps we need and we'll be holding tryouts later next week. 

Thanks for the interest!

replies.body: Maybe you might get players if you stop advertising your defiance team as diamond when they usually go 1-4 on their placements and barely get gold. They have literally tried 4 times now

> [{quoted}](name=EL Gizzel LoL,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=YEdA5TzJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-04T21:10:41.708+0000)
>
> Maybe you might get players if you stop advertising your defiance team as diamond when they usually go 1-4 on their placements and barely get gold. They have literally tried 4 times now

So much sass. God anivia also.

Defiance are diamond, I'm sorry that you're frustrated or feel annoyed that you didn't make the team, but that's no real reason to come here and try to act smart. Getting trial teams placed in gold doesn't really mean anything, but good job and thanks for the post!
yea.. nah they aint diamond lol.
